alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 6:56PM EST until February 28 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Barbourville affecting Knox County. Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying areas along George Hayes Road flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage by early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
